Description: Test if the system can autonomously navigate through intersections with traffic lights and pedestrians.
Test if the system detects surrounding vehicles and adjusts speed or lane position when necessary.
Check if the system provides real-time alerts for any malfunctions or detected obstacles.
Verify that the system can smoothly switch between highway and urban driving modes.
Test if the system can autonomously park in both parallel and perpendicular spaces.
Test if the system can autonomously merge onto highways without driver intervention.
Check if the system can detect emergency vehicles and yield the right-of-way.
Verify that the system optimizes fuel efficiency during autonomous driving by adjusting speed as needed.
Test if the system can navigate through construction zones or road closures autonomously.
Test if the system can safely navigate through adverse weather conditions (e.g., rain, snow, fog).
Test if the system provides real-time route suggestions based on current traffic conditions.
Verify if the system alerts the driver when the vehicle deviates from its lane or road boundaries.
Test if the system allows the driver to customize driving preferences and settings.
Verify if the system sends maintenance or update notifications to the driver.
Check if the system can detect pedestrians and cyclists and avoid collisions.
